session_summary: Phase 5 pattern analysis 100% complete; Phase 6 consolidation active. Factory legacy shims added (core/extended) delegating to SSOT. Utils import fixes verified. Deployment ready for FreeRideInvestor + Prismblossom (manual WordPress push). SSOT tagging at 39% coverage; Phase 6A domain SSOTs (Execution, Resource, Lifecycle) established. Stall Resumer Guard implemented.

phase5_pattern_analysis.description: Handlers/routers/services/clients/adapters/factories analyzed. Client/adapter/factory consolidation recs published. Legacy factory_core/factory_extended converted to shims pointing to SSOT StrategicOversightFactory.

utils_import_fixes.description: agent_matching.py duplicate import + missing validator fixed; coordination_utils.py import order fixed.

deployment_readiness.description: FreeRideInvestor + Prismblossom ready for manual WordPress deploy (5 files). Deployment checklist and execution instructions prepared; Agent-1 coordination initiated.

stall_resumer_guard.description: Stall Resumer Guard implemented (is_resumer_prompt, is_meaningful_progress) and stall prompt template hardened.

phase6_consolidation.description: Phase 6A manager/domain consolidation active. Execution/Resource/Lifecycle SSOTs created; Monitoring domain SSOT pending.

deployment_timing.description: Awaiting Agent-1 timing window to push FreeRideInvestor + Prismblossom via WordPress/SFTP.

ssot_tagging.description: Architecture SSOT tagging at 39% (358/919); continuing tagging of core + Discord infrastructure files.

progress_metrics.phase5_completion: 100% pattern analysis complete; factory shims in place
progress_metrics.deployment: Manual WordPress deploy ready (5 files); timing pending Agent-1

high: Execute manual WordPress deployment for FreeRideInvestor + Prismblossom with Agent-1 timing
Complete Monitoring Domain SSOT (Phase 6A) and increase BaseManager adoption
Advance SSOT tagging beyond 39% coverage (focus on core + infrastructure)
medium: Verify factory shim removal plan after confirming zero usage
Monitor for deployment regressions post-WordPress push

blockers: Awaiting Agent-1 deployment window; manual WordPress access required to push 5 files
Monitoring domain SSOT pending design finalization
notes: Deployment ready: 4 FreeRideInvestor CSS/ PHP updates + 1 Prismblossom CSS expansion; manual WordPress/SFTP required.
Factory legacy files now shims with deprecation warnings to enforce SSOT usage.
tools_created: Stall Resumer Guard (is_resumer_prompt, is_meaningful_progress) for autonomous stall recovery
lessons_learned: Maintain backward-compatible shims while enforcing SSOT to de-risk deletion.
Manual WordPress deploys require confirmed window and cache checks; prep checklists ahead of time.
Stall guards with content checks reduce false positives and keep execution moving.
